body:
Hello Guys! Terra here and i wanna start off by this server is really great, thanks to my friend MrChappy
(who is also a friend of mine IRL) for introducing me to this server.

Now anyways on to the topic, As some of you may know in some of the games that i played i keep mentioning
stuff like "Fishing Rod OP" or like "F5 Tactic or F3+A Spam to see players in reloading chunks" and etc. etc.
Well this is because i came from servers which bind tactics like these to make PvP gameplay more and more
technique, strategic, and interestingly better i guess... 

Now you may wonder how are these "strategies/tactics" you are saying play out or how does it work?
Well if you take a look at these videos below

(Huahwi PvP Tips & Tricks)
https://youtu.be/iPiMMla-mwU

(Huahwi MCSG PvP Montage: Savior)
https://youtu.be/nDEnfS0r5Co

(BiboyQG 10,000 Subscriber PvP Montage)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_l-obOc17S8

(ElliotElite 2,000 Subscriber PvP Inspirational Montage)
https://youtu.be/WicJ6wFAbhY 

(xNestorio UHC Highlights)
https://youtu.be/QmX-q-JemRU 

Thats pretty much it, and also note that im an asian player so i dont get decent nor good ping to the server but i usuall manage, and if you guys have any further questions regarding the thread let me, any opinions are free and open down in the replies below!  Much Love, No Hate!

This is one of my Custom PVP Default Edits, you can download if you are interested
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7btc0wb24qw9r1h/ElitePack%21.zip?dl=0

Hello Guys! Terra here and i wanna start off by this server is really great, thanks to my friend MrChappy
(who is also a friend of mine IRL) for introducing me to this server.

Now anyways on to the topic, As some of you may know in some of the games that i played i keep mentioning
stuff like "Fishing Rod OP" or like "F5 Tactic or F3+A Spam to see players in reloading chunks" and etc. etc.
Well this is because i came from servers which bind tactics like these to make PvP gameplay more and more
technique, strategic, and interestingly better i guess... 

Now you may wonder how are these "strategies/tactics" you are saying play out or how does it work?
Well if you take a look at these videos below

Thats pretty much it, and also note that im an asian player so i dont get decent nor good ping to the server but i usuall manage, and if you guys have any further questions regarding the thread let me, any opinions are free and open down in the replies below!  Much Love, No Hate!

This is one of my Custom PVP Default Edits, you can download if you are interested
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7btc0wb24qw9r1h/ElitePack%21.zip?dl=0
title: Influence of MCSG  and UHC style of PvP

replies.body:
The problems with adding UHC, from a previous UHC host:

  • Auto Hosting UHCs are hard to moderate, and aren't easy to fix if something goes wrong
  • Hosted UHCs need hosts (If Avicus needs hosts, I'm straight down on that list)
  • It takes a lot of time to code
I personally like the idea of non auto hosted UHCs, for example, you could apply to be a host and host matches once a week or something. This may not work because of the player amount on Avicus, buts its getting better.
replies.body_tagged:

  • Auto Hosting UHCs are hard to moderate, and aren't easy to fix if something goes wrong

  • It takes a lot of time to code
I personally like the idea of non auto hosted UHCs, for example, you could apply to be a host and host matches once a week or something. This may not work because of the player amount on Avicus, buts its getting better.

1. Huawhi, really?
2. Who cares about lag.. It doesn't really matter.
3. These "PvP Tips" you're posting here will most likely disappear when the servers switch from 1.8 to 1.9. So far what 1.9 is trying to do is to kill the few good gameplay that's left.

replies.body:
Im going to have to disagree, Huahwi is right about the pingers part.

There are no such thing as pingers, since if your a good player you can beat one. For instance all you need to do is strafe. I get 12 ms and people easily beat me, but thats almost always because of 20 fps.

You can beat a pinger, you just need strats.

As to Huahwi, I think he does suck, all I need is 60 fps and Im fine.

His PC is 2 good lol.

replies.body:
glad to see a reply like this, yesterday, idk how or what but i had like 300 ping on average and i took out a 4v1 of another team w/ my bad ping (but for that sequence i was getting nice hit connection/reach while i was strafing) and the fact that 2 or 3 of them had like less than 100 or even less than 75 ping on average and had full iron-iron sword (got called a hacker by the last guy i killed in the 4v1 cuz i 11 hearted him cuz i got like a penta-hit towards the last succession of sword-hit-trades) then another 2 guys came after and i killed them as well w/ 7 or 8 hearts left. 

Picture of stats page w/ the 4v1 then 2v1 http://prntscr.com/72sqo2

replies.body:
Wow, nice!

There really isnt such thing as a pinger, because all ping has his advantages.

For instance Miguel uses his lag, which is like 400 ms, to get extra kb. Its also a lot easier for him to strafe because everyone sees him as a teleporting nub! xP

In my case, I get 14-24 ms, and I take advantage of it by practicing my strafes and kb tactics a lot. Also when my aim is good I can combo someone easily or get double crits. 

All Im saying is different ping has his advantages.
replies.body_tagged:

ty! and ppl should learn that there is no such thing as ping, if u know they have good ping u cant say pinger cuz its not their fault for having good connection/ping.

look at me i have 300 ping on average and i can still pull this off http://prntscr.com/72ziof

replies.body: and sometimes i dont need to rely on straight up pvp, i can play defensive and use a vanguard (strong morale point/chokepoint) to get kills like using basic traps like holes then a 1 block gap so i can kill them under, etc.

replies.body: tbh high ping 200+ makes it harder to play. Playing pub OCN is no problem, but you'll notice how much harder it is with higher ping once you get to high level of play (ie. tournament invitationals)
replies.body_tagged: tbh high ping 200+ makes it harder to play. Playing pub OCN is no problem, but you'll notice how much harder it is with higher ping once you get to high level of play (ie. tournament invitationals)

replies.body:
thanks to all those who greeted me welcome, i know its been a rough start w/ me yanking on ppl w/ harsh words unsportsmanlike attitude but i will try my best not to tolerate those who try to bring me down or whenever i just feel to annoyed/irritated, i dont want my reputation to go all "hes such an a**hole" and such and such, so i wanna apologize to the ppl i called stuff like "ez" "kid" "nub" etc.

i understand if you hate me but im willing to change for the better
